Description: Nocode platform for building Enterprise Metaverse applications
Full Description: Going through tons of graphs, charts, and dashboards is very cumbersome and painful for business owners. That's why they are adopting the Enterprise Metaverse in the form of Digital twins. From a survey conducted by Gartner, 75% of businesses want to implement digital twins, but only 13% have implemented it so far; the other 62% have it on their roadmap but find it hard or don't have the direct skill set in the team to implement it. After all, it's not a simple task to create a working, scalable, and living virtual replica of your factories in 3D. It's really complicated, requires a specialized 3D development team and specialized engineers to do the job; thus out of the reach of many businesses. This is where we step in to bridge the gap by bringing the capabilities of NoCode into a 3D workspace that allows businesses to build 3D apps without writing any code or having to depend on a 3D team.

Industries: Clinical Trials, Health Care, Medical, Pharmaceutical
Description: Oncospherix is the culmination of a multi-year research program for cancer.
Full Description: OncoSpherix, Inc., based in Atlanta, Ga, is a pre-clinical stage oncology drug development company that is advancing a proprietary platform of first-in-class small molecule therapeutics that are designed to improve the quality of life and survival for people with many forms of cancer by targeting a common feature of solid tumors: the activation of hypoxia inducible factor-1 (HIF-1). Nearly all solid cancers grow faster than their blood supply, leading to regions of low oxygen in the tumors and HIF activation. The HIFs in turn induce the expression of over 100 genes that help tumor cells survive and spread. OncoSpherix has several classes of small molecules that block activation of HIF-1 through novel mechanisms. OncoSpherix’s lead clinical candiate has been shown in mouse models to reduce primary tumor growth, inhibit metastases, and prolong survival in many types of cancer (glioblastoma, pancreatic cancer, uveal melanoma, lung cancer, breast cancer). Importantly, the agents are well tolerated and can be combined with therapeutics that work in well oxygenated regions of cancers, leading to dramatically enhanced cancer control.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Atlanta Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Health Care
Top 5 Investors: National Institutes of Health, Georgia Research Alliance

It provides: - single sign-on for corporate apps - white label authentication mobile app - on-premise authentication server - two authentication factors during a single registration process - custom authentication flow Remme Keyhub automates certificate lifecycle management with ease. Industries: Food and Beverage, Food Processing, Nutrition
Description: Haofood creates plant-based chicken using peanut protein through extrusion processing.
Full Description: The popularity of plant-based meat is rapidly growing in China; in 2020, 39% of the population were attempting to reduce their meat consumption, and 65% of them were willing to try plant-based meat to help them in this. However, many are dissatisfied with the plant-based meat options in China; Haofood’s founders discovered that this was because of the tofu-like quality of products currently available in the market. On top of that, often flexitarians and vegetarians struggle with craving comfort foods. Being the most consumed meat in the world, chicken products, such as fried chicken, are a comfort food to and missed by countless first-time vegetarians. Haofood offers a solution to these problems with its realistically textured and healthy plant-based chicken. They are the first company in the world to use peanut protein as their base, taking advantage of its potential for a strong and elastic texture. Led by a founding team of senior professionals from the food industry, who, together, hold a well-rounded skill set ranging from entrepreneurship to food technology, Haofood uses its own proprietary extrusion technology and formulation to create affordable, delicious plant-based chicken made from sustainable, non-GMO peanuts.

By harnessing the power of AI, Offside AI helps businesses unlock new opportunities, improve efficiency, and gain a competitive edge in the market. Offside AI believes in maintaining open lines of communication and providing clear, concise updates on project progress, fostering trust and accountability. Recognizing the importance of data security and regulatory compliance in the modern business landscape, Offside AI maintains the highest standards of data protection and adheres to all applicable laws and regulations. Offside AI's ultimate goal is to empower its clients to succeed by providing them with AI solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage. With a strong focus on MLOps and AI-based software products, Offside AI Inc. is committed to delivering innovative, secure, and efficient solutions that enable enterprise clients to harness the full potential of AI and ML technologies. Description: Trooly delivers Instant Trust™ services that verify, screen and predict trustworthy relationships and interactions. #FinTech #P2P
Full Description: Trooly delivers Instant Trust™ services that verify, screen and predict trustworthy relationships and interactions. We work with the world’s largest financial institutions, peer-to-peer marketplaces, marketers and employers. Our Instant Trust rating service is designed to fill a “trust gap” caused by the speed of modern commerce and community, which requires instant evaluation of potential reward and risk – without the trust-building interaction history and feedback loops that people use to evaluate relationships offline. Our machine learning technology synthesizes digital footprints in real time to provide rich insight — well beyond old-school background checks, credit scores and risk management tools. Instant Trust ratings require minimal customer data input and cost less than $1 per query, with ratings and supporting evidence returned in roughly 30 seconds. Trooly’s predictive power has been demonstrated to be at least twice as effective as background checks, credit checks or database profiles in determining trustworthiness of individuals and businesses. Trooly operates as a consumer reporting agency, using only public and permissible information from online and offline sources. We respect and comply with applicable privacy and data protection laws, including the Fair Credit Reporting Act in the United States. We are also dedicated to balancing transparency with respect for individual privacy.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Other, Professional Services, Software

Description: Peptomyc focuses on the development of a new generation of cell-penetrating peptides targeting the Myconcoprotein for cancer treatment.
Full Description: Peptomyc is a company focused on the development of a new generation of cell-penetrating peptides (CPPs) targeting the Myc oncoprotein for cancer treatment. The company was founded in December 2014 and it is based on Dr. Soucek’s scientific research in Omomyc (the best direct Myc inhibitor known to date) over the last twenty years. Currently, cancer incidence in the world exceeds 14 million cases per year and results in 8 million deaths annually. Moreover, such numbers are forecast to rise by 75% over the next 20 years (World Cancer Report. International Agency for Research on Cancer 2014). At the moment, standard therapies include surgery, radiotherapy, chemotherapy, and, in a restricted subset of cancers, precision medicine. Unfortunately, very often these therapies fail, due to the development of resistance. Peptomyc has adopted a different strategy based on the inhibition of the oncoprotein Myc, which is found deregulated in the majority of human cancers. Myc holds a non-redundant function in cancer around which tumors cannot evolve, hence targeting Myc is the most promising therapeutic opportunity to date. Although Myc plays a central role in cancer there is currently no Myc inhibitor in the market.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Description: Helian Health is a Chinese hospital WiFi and cloud-based app provider.
Full Description: Zhejiang Qilian Network Technology (abbreviation: Qilian Health) was established in 2014. It is located in Hangzhou, the most dynamic Internet city, formerly known as the Wireless Business Division of Lianlian Group. It has focused on the medical Internet industry for many years and is committed to Internet technology has established a large platform for serving patients, doctors, and hospitals. With the mission of “creating the health services around us”, we strive to realize the vision of “making life more healthy”. Currently, Qilian Health has completed billion-round B-round financing, and its business scope has expanded from hospital WIFI, patient-side APP, and medical-end APP to providing one-stop hospital Internet of Things application solutions. At the beginning of its establishment, Qilian HealthTaking the hospital WIFI as an entry point, it has invested a lot of resources to deepen the hospital scene services. With the world's leading professional technology, industry-leading product portfolio, and top-notch partners, it has successfully served thousands of large-scale general hospitals. Currently, it has signed more than 1,700 hospitals in 245 cities (including more than 400 triple-A hospitals), covering more than 900 million outpatient visits, and the total number of AP coverage is nearly 100,000, which exceeds the total number of competitors in the industry and has become China's largest hospital WIFI service provider. With high-quality hospital WIFI as the carrier, Qilian Health has designed a modular user-centric service design and launched the Medicare Xiaobian Medical Aid APP, a corporate employee health management platform, and a health APP. Xiaoyi Medical Aid App is positioned as a medical aide and provides medical staff with free access to the Internet, electronic cloud cases, medical tools, case exchanges, clinical guidelines and other medical tools. At present, Xiaoyu Medical Assistance APP installs 750,000+ users and registers medical personnel 170,000+. Health App, which assembles top medical resources in the country and relies on artificial intelligence to accurately interpret personal health data in a comprehensive manner. It customizes personalized health management programs, differentiated exercise prescriptions and balanced meal plans for companies, builds corporate health service ecosystem, and enables employees to Healthier and more dynamic. Based on the absolute market share in the hospital's Wi-Fi market, Qilian has quickly and effectively deployed hospital Internet of Things and has reached a strategic cooperation with well-known equipment manufacturer Foxconn, and will jointly invest in establishing a joint venture to provide IoT application solutions for medical institutions. Qilian is responsible for the business development, signing, and development and implementation of Internet of Things projects. Foxconn provides special equipment, platforms, and building technologies for hospital Internet of Things, centering on outpatient and hospitalization scenarios, and using WIFI, LoRa and other Internet of Things technologies to achieve The opening of the hospital's resources and services helps medical institutions reduce operating costs, improve service efficiency, and increase revenue. With the acceleration of consumer upgrades and aging, and the rapid development of network technology, “Internet+Medical” and “Internet of Things+Medical” have broad prospects and space. In the future, Qilian will deepen its cultivation of big data and medical and health industries. Through cooperation with professional companies and hospitals in general, Qilian will rapidly grow and expand and will create healthy services around them to make life healthier.

Description: Leaf is a digital wallet that enables the unbanked to store, send, receive, and exchange currencies on their phones— no smartphone required.
Full Description: Nearly 2 billion people around the world are unbanked and lack access to formal financial services. For refugees, migrants, and cross border traders, this is particularly challenging because they have no safe or reliable way to bring their money across borders or an affordable way to send and receive money, leaving them vulnerable to exploitative exchange rates and theft. With Leaf, users can travel without cash and rest assured that their money will be safe and accessible no matter where they go. Friends and family around the world can also deposit into a refugee’s account, regardless of location. Backed by blockchain technology of Stellar, Leaf ultimately creates an economic identity that customers can use to establish themselves in a new country.

Description: Snowit is the online travel agency for winter sports holidays
Full Description: Snowit is a smart online travel agency that aggregates in one platform all the services for skiers and snowboarders: skipass, equipment rent, ski lessons, experiences and accommodation. Booking snow activities online is not easy, the online market is highly fragmented and poorly organized. In fact, each ski area has its own website and skipass online purchases can generally be done only when already owning the local skipass card. Besides the skipass, booking online a full holiday on the snow is complex because of the lack and fragmentation of the offer. Snowit aims at becoming the reference point for winter-related services in multiple ski areas across Europe, allowing users to easily organize their holidays on the snow by booking online all the services they need from accommodation to ski lessons. Moreover, the Snowitcard, that allows to purchase online the ski pass for all ski resorts in the circuit and to go directly at the lift, is a powerful instrument of promotion and loyalty. Snowit booking engine allows also user to compare the total cost of holiday for multiple destination and to recommend the best destination depending on user profile and needs.

Description: The neo-bank for teens to help them grow money skills (currently in pre-launch. Launch in Q3 2021)
Full Description: Knowing how to manage your money. You ain’t born with it. And school is all quadratic equations, geography and carving out your name on your desk. Getting to grips with the day-to-day skills of saving, spending and investing isn’t exactly what most families talk about over their breakfast toast either. We think that learning how to handle personal finances is something that should be encouraged from the second we hit those teenage years. And challenging though it may be, what do we do with challenges? We Rise to them.  Rise is *the* money app & debit card specifically designed for teenagers, allowing them to practice spending, saving and even investing in their future. No mum, this isn't just a phase. We want to inspire a financially savvy generation to confidently flex when it comes to handling their money, on a platform that high-key hits different. Rise is all about learning whilst doing, but not without security. Parents have a dedicated interface, complete with flexible parental controls. You get to keep an eye on your teens financial world, in real-time. Rise creates a safe, monitorable environment for your teen to learn about money.  Flexible, financial exploration for teens that’s secure, fun and packed into one, easy-to-use app. Let’s create a generation as confident with money as they are with TikTok.  How? Simple. Rise up. Rise on.

Description: Willicroft, is an Amsterdam plant-based cheese producer. We produce planet-proof cheese for dairy cheese lovers.
Full Description: Inspired by our founders families dairy farming roots dating back to 1957, Willicroft was re-imagined as a plant-based cheese company in Amsterdam in 2018 Cheese is the 3rd highest emitting food type after beef and lamb. The emissions created by Europeans cheese consumption alone is the equivalent to Belgium’s total emissions.  Our new bean-based range produces up to 6 times less CO2 than the dairy alternatives it’s replacing. We believe that holistic solutions are needed to create major changes in our food system – having recently secured B Corp status and begun growing beans in the Netherlands in 2022, we’re on track to address many of the problems at their root cause. In May 2022 we completed a 2m EUR pre-Series A. The raise will enable us to bring our delicious, beautifully branded range of PBC’s to 3 new markets: the UK, Germany and the Nordics, bringing in senior hires and continuing on our quest to become the world’s first net-positive plant-based cheese company. The investment was led by early-stage investor Rockstart and PINC, Paulig’s venture arm. Döhler and Feast Ventures also participated as co-investors alongside a number of angels. ---- Don’t take our word for it…  Marika King, Head of PINC, says, “Willicroft is by far the tastiest plant-based cheese range we have come across. It has a more nutritious and sustainable ingredient list than most alternatives available today and a high-powered team with traction in Europe, so we could not be more excited to support this venture.” Mark Durno, Managing Partner AgriFood, Rockstart, says, “Willicroft is taking plant-based dairy alternatives to the next level. Alongside making delicious products, they are helping farmers to transition to sustainable production by enabling a local supply chain without the need for monocropping or highly processed ingredients. They have spent the last years understanding their consumers and their footprint, and the next phase will be to put those learnings to scale.”
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Food and Beverage, Manufacturing

Description: Next-gen business travel management for organisations looking to save money on travel by rewarding their staff when they cut costs.
Full Description: At Ortharize, we're making business travel better.   We make it easier for organisations to book everything they need in one place as well as keeping costs down. We offer over half a million hotels, more than four hundred airlines, UK rail and all major car rental companies across the globe, including a large selection of budget options.    The Ortharize platform is a new concept and offering an innovative approach to managing and booking business travel. We're disrupting a relatively archaic part of the travel industry by giving businesses a crammed toolbox of reporting, engagement and traveller safety tools.    We offer over a dozen reports, an approval system for managers, a trip system (that solves the problem of using multiple sites for booking different types of travel) and a travel policy system run by a home-grown algorithm that allows companies to curb spending and set rules/restrictions across their travel habits.    Unlike other providers, we don’t charge online booking fees. Coupled with our exciting awards and incentives, we use gamification to cut travel costs by up to 40%. Our effortless automation tools will also help cut your admin, saving even more time and money on your organisation’s business travel.    We place a huge emphasis of data, including through our carbon emission tracking, that reduces a previously laborious data analysis of an organisation’s travel into a couple of clicks. Organisations are flocking to Ortharize for our low travel costs, our innovative platform (and companion app) and 24/7/365 UK customer support.

Description: we operationalise blockchain to support asset identification and frictionless trade
Full Description: We are operationalising blockchain technology across global supply chains. We do this by optimising the accuracy and traceability of critical data to enable goods and services to flow more seamlessly. With our deep supply chain expertise and experience, we blend best-in-class technology with cutting edge science to prove, authenticate, validate and ensure supply chain integrity. Using multifactor verification, we create a single source of the truth and establish new levels of trust between producers, manufacturers, hauliers, retailers, government agencies and regulators. ubloquity has established roots in the agricultural and technology industry. Our first blockchain-enabled product was designed to prove the authenticity and provenance of beef cattle in Northern Ireland. We’ve since diversified to serve multiple sectors from retailers to regulators, pharmaceutical firms to food and beverage companies. We were the exclusive smart borders blockchain partner of Fujitsu in Europe (2021-2023), and as such are capable of underpinning critical national infrastructure. We have also trialled a digital chain of custody for the world's largest producer of herbs and spices which means they can immediately trace the source of a jar of chilli pepper on the shelf at the touch of a button.

Full Description: The Madaster Platform is designed as a public, online library of materials in the built environment. The Madaster Platform facilitates registration, organisation, storage and exchange of data. Madaster carefully focuses on privacy, security and continuity. Madaster is the cadastre for materials. Raw materials are scarce but limited and must therefore be well documented so that they remain unlimited. With the help of the material passport, materials get an identity, which means that they can never disappear in anonymity as waste. Madaster acts as a library and generator for material passports. An independent platform accessible to all: individuals, businesses and governments. Madaster is being developed under the supervision of the Madaster Foundation. It is Madaster's mission to eliminate waste by providing materials with an identity.

Description: By-the-hour luxury hotel booking platform for urban travellers in Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia and Vietnam
Full Description: With Flow App, you can book a hotel room or work desk with flexible check-in time and duration from 1 to 12 hours. You can save up to 75% off the regular full-day booking prices. Our partners include 3 to 5 star hotels as well as stylish co-working spaces. You can enjoy all the amenities on the premise as well. Why book for the whole day, if you need to stay for just a few hours? Book with Flow App now! "Let Us Take Care of Your Flow" - Instantly book an hourly hotel room or co-working space for only the time you need through our Flow App. Whether you need a room or office desk now or in a few days, Flow App is the ultimate solution for affordable and last-minute space booking during the daytime. We offer flexible check-in and check-out times and you can pay by the minute, by the timeslots, or by the night. You deserve a better plan and only pay for what you need. The perfect solution for travellers: - Stopover between flights - Timely relax with a nap after shopping - Quick recharge from hours of traveling around - Photo-shooting or interviews with thematic room settings - Lunch break or daybreak between split shifts Flow App is your best app with the lowest price for bookings with hotels, for any reason. Here at Flow we strive for creating the best customer experience and will make you fall in love with the concept of the "intra-day hotel". We know as a business traveller you: - Spend a lot of time traveling in-between meetings that you have no time to focus on work - Look for a place nearby to touch up the presentation deck or send an email before a client meeting - Want a quiet environment to take calls or join Skype conference - Get a request from a client who just arrived in town to meet up We truly understand the truth for businessmen who frequently travels for work – it’s tough to be productive on the road Through Flow you can book your hourly office space for a few hours or half a day, from the comfort of your palm. And it is as easy as a few clicks. There are numerous reasons to book a day room of office with Flow App - whether you are looking for a temporary private space or a nearby comfortable place to recharge yourselves between 9 and 5, Flow App offers you an alternative hotel and working experience – intraday hotels and workspace are here to satisfy all your desires. Our features: - Book an hourly hotel room or office desk - Instant payment and real-time confirmation by credit card 24/7 - Complete the booking by only in a few clicks - Daytime hotels or offices in busy districts around the corner - Real-time information about availability and prices

Description: Shipshape designs and manufactures modular, hydroponic farms that make fresh vegetables accessible in urban markets year-round.
Full Description: At Shipshape Urban Farms, we envision a future where sustainable agriculture converges seamlessly with urban landscapes, transforming the way we grow, consume, and think about food. As the CEO of Shipshape Urban Farms, I am committed to leading our company on a path of innovation and growth that reshapes the sustainable farming landscape. In 2023, we are driven by our focus on container gardens, fostering sales and introducing our concept to individuals, families, and businesses alike. The construction of three modular container gardens serves as our hallmark in Birmingham, Alabama, where innovation meets reality, generating a substantial $45K per month in revenue. This landmark achievement is only the beginning. We are excited to pilot partnerships with esteemed grocery store chains, nearby restaurants, and bustling farmers markets, cementing our place as pioneers in sustainable agriculture. Looking ahead to 2024, we will embark on a journey of growth and investment. Our aim is to raise $10 million, propelling us toward the creation of our first HAB in Huntsville, Alabama, a 3D-printed marvel. Simultaneously, we will expand our contracts with grocery stores, working tirelessly to secure our position as a leading supplier of fresh, locally grown produce. The path to our goal is paved with essential milestones: completing carbon capture testing with the National Carbon Center, forging impactful collaborations with NASA, signing contracts for five new Container Gardens, and realizing the completion of our Birmingham Farm. Partnerships for the construction of our HABs are instrumental in our progress, amplifying our vision and reach. With our sights set on 2025, we plan to raise a combination of VC and/or bank loans $200 million to construct 20 new HABs across the United States and strategic locations worldwide. Our partnerships with grocery stores flourish, and we will expand our impact and influence on the food industry. We anticipate the launch of our inaugural project with NASA and Above Space, a testament to our prowess in innovation and cutting-edge technology. By signing contracts for 45 new Container Gardens, we will make a resounding statement about the future of sustainable agriculture. After celebrating a full year of operation for our Huntsville HAB, our vision will extend to new revenue streams, including the sale of HABs to third parties, carbon capture endeavors, and a promising collaboration with NASA in the realm of space. By 2026, our focus shifts toward operating with precision and excellence, optimizing every facet of our endeavors. This sets the stage for 2027, when we embark on the next phase of our journey: the pursuit of an exit strategy that honors our mission, our investors, and our relentless pursuit of redefining urban farming. Together, with a dedicated team and steadfast commitment to sustainability and innovation, we at Shipshape Urban Farms are on a mission to cultivate a greener, more nourished future for all. Our container gardens, HABs, and pioneering partnerships are but the beginning of a groundbreaking era in sustainable agriculture. Join us in sowing the seeds of change and watch as we transform cities into vibrant, self-sustaining ecosystems of growth, health, and prosperity. Shipshape is a woman - and veteran-owned Delaware C-Corp. Based on ideas and concepts developed during their time in college, Angela and Dale Speetjens founded Shipshape.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Software
Top 5 Investors: Techstars, gbeta, HudsonAlpha AgTech

This 360-degree approach allows students to receive academic assistance from their university at any time and any place, not just during available business hours. TEDU's primary target markets are universities worldwide that consistently need to improve their academic offerings to stay competitive in the education environment while also improving their students' retention and performance rates to continue receiving funding.

Full Description: Starium Innovative Healthcare is a pioneering pharmaceutical company based in India, renowned for its innovative approach to healthcare solutions. As an Indian pharmaceutical startup, Starium has quickly made its mark in the industry through its commitment to cutting-edge research, development, and a mission to improve healthcare outcomes on a global scale. Key attributes and characteristics of Starium Innovative Healthcare: 1. Innovation at its Core:    Starium Innovative Healthcare thrives on innovation. The company is dedicated to discovering new and groundbreaking pharmaceutical products and therapies that can address some of the most challenging and prevalent medical conditions. Through a strong emphasis on research and development, they continually seek innovative solutions to enhance the quality of life for patients worldwide. 2. High-Quality Product Portfolio:    The company offers a diverse range of high-quality pharmaceutical products, including prescription drugs, over-the-counter medications, and specialty medicines. Their product portfolio covers a broad spectrum of therapeutic areas, from chronic diseases to acute conditions, catering to a wide demographic of patients. 3. Commitment to Patient Welfare:    Starium Innovative Healthcare places patient welfare at the forefront of its business. Their research and development processes prioritize safety and efficacy, ensuring that the products they create are not only effective but also safe for consumption. Their commitment to patient health extends beyond the laboratory, encompassing comprehensive patient education and support. 4. Global Reach:    Although based in India, Starium Innovative Healthcare has a global perspective. The company is focused on expanding its presence and influence on the global pharmaceutical market. Through strategic partnerships, international collaborations, and a strong supply chain, they aim to make their products accessible to patients in various parts of the world. 5. Ethical Practices:    Ethical practices are the bedrock of Starium Innovative Healthcare's operations. The company follows rigorous quality control measures and adheres to all industry regulations and standards. Their commitment to ethical conduct extends to interactions with healthcare professionals, patients, and stakeholders. 6. Dedication to Research and Development:    Starium Innovative Healthcare invests significantly in research and development. They actively engage in clinical trials, seeking to develop and bring to market the most advanced and effective pharmaceutical solutions. Their research teams collaborate with leading experts in the field, ensuring that their products are at the forefront of medical advancement. 7. Sustainability and Social Responsibility:    As a responsible corporate citizen, Starium Innovative Healthcare is committed to sustainability and social responsibility. They take measures to reduce their environmental footprint and actively engage in community outreach programs aimed at improving healthcare access and awareness.

Plume supports complex and challenging learning, inspired by the latest research on writing instruction, which shows that:  - teachers are unable to devote enough time and effort to teaching creative writing; - students do not write often enough and are seldom asked to write longer papers that demand analysis and interpretation; - [digital technology](https://www.learninga-z.com/site/breakroom/technology-in-the-classroom), including word processors and computers, is not an integral part of most writing instruction in schools. Description: Evollume.com represents a game-changing innovation in the world of e-commerce
Full Description: Introducing a revolutionary new website that combines the best features of two of the world's largest e-commerce platforms to create an unparalleled product sourcing experience. With this website, wholesalers, manufacturers, and retailers can easily find the products they need from a single dashboard. The website features an intuitive interface that allows users to search for products by category, brand, price, and other criteria. Users can also view product reviews and ratings, compare prices from multiple suppliers, and place orders directly through the platform. One of the key advantages of this website is that it caters to all types of businesses, whether they are large enterprises or small startups. Wholesalers can easily find manufacturers who can provide them with the bulk quantities they need, while manufacturers can connect with retailers who are looking for specific products to sell. Retailers can also benefit from the website's extensive inventory and competitive pricing, making it easier for them to source the products they need to stock their stores. Another unique feature of this website is its ability to handle international transactions, including currency conversion and shipping. This means that businesses from all over the world can connect and do business with each other, opening up new markets and opportunities for growth. Overall, this website represents a game-changing innovation in the world of e-commerce, making it easier than ever for businesses of all sizes to source the products they need from a single, easy-to-use platform.

Description: Our end-to-end crypto offering includes a peer-to-peer marketplace, wallet supporting 42 coins and an exchange supporting 15 trading pairs.
Full Description: Coindirect accelerates African cryptocurrency adoption by building a bridge between the decentralised world of crypto and the centralised world of traditional finance. The Coindirect founding team are from South Africa.  We've created an end-to-end crypto trading platform that allows users to buy and sell coins directly on our peer-to-peer marketplace - without having to first convert - at 0% transaction fees using multiple payment methods, from credit card and local bank transfer through to Paypal. Our wallet supports over 40 different coins and altcoins, including ERC-20 coins; while our Exchange platform supports 15 different trading pairs.  The promise is that every African, from a first-time buyer to a pro-investor, can easily and securely buy, sell, trade and track their assets in one place. In addition to creating a service for consumers, Coindirect gives other fintech services access to its underlying tech platform via an API.  Coindirect is powering the mainstream adoption of cryptocurrency in Africa and across the globe. By bridging the gap between the traditional finance world and the endless possibilities ahead of us, anyone can #OwnThe Future. Visit our website - Coindirect.com

Industries: Analytics, Consumer Research, Enterprise Software, Market Research, Software
Description: The most realistic behavioral insights platform to answer with confidence major business questions surrounding (new) products and services
Full Description: Veylinx is the most realistic behavioral insights platform to answer with confidence major business questions surrounding new products and services during all stages of the development cycle. Veylinx obtains behavioral consumer insights using a Nobel prize-winning approach in which consumers have real skin-in-the-game to reliably measure demand. This is a major shift from current market research practices that still rely on what consumers hypothetically claim they will buy. Veylinx has its root as an academic project at the University of Amsterdam, where Founder and CEO Anouar El Haji, obtained his PhD in Marketing. Since December 2015 Veylinx has been disrupting the world of market research supporting mostly Fortune 500 companies such as Procter & Gamble and Unilever to guide them on major decisions on product developments and initiatives. Besides the fact that Veylinx continues to be applied by academic researchers, Veylinx won a number of industry awards among which the IIeX Insights Innovation Award for its paradigm-shifting approach.
